content.detailedDescription:
I was in my apartment parking garage at op look for some privacy to smoke a cigarette and get away from a hard day at work.

i stared at them for about 30min and  noticed that they were bigger than big commercial planes flying by. the lights were swaying side to side slighly as if hanging by a string. 

i thought it was a plane coming in my direction because i live by one of the largest airports in the usa. 

it was a large sphere light and a smaller where light bothe appeared larger than commercial planes that hold 200+people. when i zoomed in on my camera it looked as if there were pink and blue pulsing colors. 

i felt like it was observing - lighting- or watching something. i was a little nervous about it.

i never lost sight after an hour and a half - i just decided to go in for the night. 

sorry i was talking in video - i am a nerd...
content.summary: Two large lights in sky - may be stars? idk. seemed odd and wasn't there next few days.

content.detailedDescription:
1) i was sitting on my back patio looking up at a white cumulus cloud that was passing in front of the sun at !0,000 feet and south of my position.
2) i saw a perfectly round object move from left to right that looked like a shadow moving between the cloud and sun. i saw the second object because i was still trying to figure out what the first one was and where it went.
3) at first, i thought it was a bird, but i couldn't figure out what bird would have a perfectly round shape and move/glide like that. then i thought it might be a plane but there was no sound. about 20 seconds later, i saw another object that looked and moved like the first one. in between sightings of the 2 objects i noticed a silver large passenger plane at 30,000 feet moving north to south far up to the right of the cloud in an area where there were no clouds.
4) the object looked like a perfectly round shadow moving quickly from left(southeast) to right(southwest) between the cumulus cloud and the sun. it made no noise and vanished/ blended in with the sky after it exited the cloud. since the object puzzled me so, i continued looking at the sky and cloud and about 30 seconds later, i saw another object that had the same shape and moved in the same direction as the first one. when that object passed from behind the cloud it also became invisible/blended with the sky. both objects were not visible to my eye before entering the cloud as well. they moved at the same height and speed and in a straight path.
5) after seeing the first object and expecting to see a bird or plane emerge from the cloud and not seeing anything, i was stunned. i kept saying "what?", "what?" out loud because i couldn't understand what i had seen. this is why i kept looking at the cloud. i didn't move from my chair. then after 20 seconds, the same object appeared again and i decided that i had try to comprehend what i was seeing. when nothing appeared again after the object left the cloud i stood up out of my chair and looked at the sky more closely it was totally invisible. i looked at my watch to make sure that i remembered the exact time it happened. i thought i just saw 2 ufos and didn't know what to do. i came inside and told my 22 year old son and my 20 year old daughter what i saw. i can't get the vision of those 2 objects moving behind the cloud out of my head! i thought of calling the faa, philadelphia international airport and even our local news but i was afraid of ridicule. i posted a question if any of my local friends on facebook might have been looking at that cloud at that time, but nobody did. i hope that someone else saw them to confirm what i saw.
6) they disappeared/were invisible.
content.summary: 2 ufos were spotted between a cloud and the sun at 10,000 feet, invisible to eye when not behind cloud, no sound

content.detailedDescription:
1. sheffield uk, gleadless valley, heeley constituency area. s14 postal area.

recording video looking west towards the sunset lit clouds. suspected unidentified aerial object is visible for less than 3 seconds moving through the cloud layer. it is distinctly not a plane or a helicopter, also the distance beyond the edge of gleadless valley, sheffield, indicates size must have been substantially larger than a passenger aircraft.

2.
i made nothing of it at the time, having not noticed it until i was looking over all my sunset recordings, no other recordings were made. the recording was accidental, thus no attempts to get a 2nd recording or focusing in on the object were possible.

3.
evidently it is strictly an unidentified aerial object of some kind, thus my report to this website...


4.
anyone who looks at this recording will know as much about it, its clearly flying, beyond the clouds, or amongst them, cant tell the angle of flight, could be straight, could be curving, simply cannot tell from a side panning recording what the flight pattern of the object was like, but it is distinctly not plane shaped, leaves no usual trail like a passenger plane, it is also a dark object, clearly grey or some dark colour, no reflection visible, you might be able to see more by zooming in on the video

5.
obviously not realizing what is was when recording means i had no reaction to it whilst i was filming and taking photos of the sunset.

6.
it is recorded in a 3 second long 1080p recording so you should be able to get a closer look yourself by zooming in on the video, although the light level is not good due to it being sunset. video is very short, object moves through sky and probably continued after the recording stopped, but obviously i was not trying to record it, having not noticed it, thus i made no further recordings.
content.summary: Filming the sunset sky, realised video contained potential ufo months after event after looking through all the videos i had recorded whilst living in sheffield.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home and then a huge flash surprised me, and i saw 20 objects at least 6 or 7 times bigger than a 747. i thought it was a ufo. it moved slowy in a path of nne- ssw, and i reacted to it. i was freaked out.
i lost sight because it flashed and it was gone
content.summary: Long sighting

content.detailedDescription:
I witnessed a tall green like alien in the basement of my house.  the event lasted about five minutes, and i felt something special in my body.  it felt as if i had lifted out of my body and froze for the length of time. also during this special event i felt electrical charges in my body, my body was glowing with some form of energy. also during this time the alien telepathically communicated with me. i witnessed some sort of space ship that their on, and they are working on experiments.  the ship was in space orbit, and it had different types technology's. the extra terrestrials have so much more advanced technology. on this particular event i saw that they are working on creating human flesh in the labs. there are many projects that they are working on,and it has to do with earth. i'm including further information that i would like to share with mufon.
the alien agenda is to persue human exploration, and their primarily visiting earth for scientific reasons. 
the extra terrestrials have told me that when they arrive on earth they are in charge of it. their very concerned about our nuclear capabilities, and how we use them in the future. the grey that contacted me, was from planet zeta reticulie, and they call them selves the templars,and centroniions. the original temple builders.  they ordered human beings to build most of the temples on earth. also they has something to do with creating planets. they may have some sort of weapon that can create planets.
content.summary: I witness a tall green and grey like entity in my basement

content.detailedDescription: Estava no deck da piscina no segundo andar da minha cobertura em niterói— rio de janeiro(brasil), na noite de quinta feira 23/7/2015, na intenção de observar algum ovni, pois poucos dias antes havia feito uma observação e um relato a mufon! não demorou muito tempo e vi um objeto semelhante a uma bola de fogo, ele tinha na parte anterior um escudo e na parte posterior uma cauda, algo semelhante a um meteoro, iniciei a filmagem quando ele pouco tempo após parou em pleno ar mudou seu curso radicalmente e desapareceu.... fiquei surpreso! era novamente um ovni!
content.summary: Era uma bola de fogo descendo da atmosfera, parou em pleno ar, mudou seu curso e desapareceu.

content.detailedDescription: I was with a small group of hunters drinking coffee in the pre-dawn hours, waiting for the sun to rise enough so we could legally hunt deer. above a range of low hills we saw three spheres hovering, then moving slowly. we estimated distance at about 10 miles from us. suddenly one sphere increased speed, splitting off from the other two.  of the remaining two, one sphere moved slowly away leaving the third sphere in its original position. after approximately one minute the third sphere quickly took off straight up, then did a 90 degree maneuver left and all three spheres disappeared one after the other. as watchers we at first thought the lights were aircraft from the air base in great falls, montana which is 90 miles from out location, but after witnessing the extreme maneuver of the last sphere and their rapid disappearance we all felt these must be et.
content.summary: 3 hoovering discs that shot off at incredible angles and disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
When i was 12, mom and i were staying at her ex-boyfriend's home for a few days. it was around new year's eve with cold weather and clear skies. we had just finished dinner and i and her boyfriends nephew,age 6 or 7, were asked to take the trash out and to the road and then get my mom's cigarettes from her car in the back yard. the porch light did not work so i had to walk slowly so i did not fall. while waiting for me to go down the steps, the nephew asked me "what is that?". i saw an egg shaped (about the size of a vw beetle) object that was glowing a faint blue color at its bottom. at first i thought some one had set one of those parachute fireworks off. i told him that was what it was. 

we took the trash to the road and went back to the car. the object was still there. it was hovering over the field near the tree line that was . the little boy and i just continued to watch it until it shot straight up in the air and disappeared. after it disappeared i notice there was an absence of a buzzing noise that had been there before it had disappeared.

when we went in the house i told my mom and her boyfriend about it. my mom did not believe it, but her boyfriend said he saw stuff out there when he was a kid.  it gave the little boy nightmares for months. he just generally started having behavior problems, but that could have been due to the issues going on in his family.

unfortunately i lost contact with the boy about a year after this because his uncle and my mom broke up.
content.summary: Egg shaped object hovers over field then flies straight up and disapears

content.detailedDescription: Was driving home from work, then i saw what appeared to be a really bright star/planet. nothing major, but slightly out of the ordinary. but as i drove down the road, it got brighter, as if i or it was getting closer. i pulled over and stared at it in awe for a few seconds. i could make out a cone/star-like shape around the light. it appeared to be hovering. as i reached for my cellphone camera, it shot off a red/orange object and almost immediately after, it sped off and got dimmer (as if it were also flying upwards) until it was no longer visible. as i continued to drive home, another, similar object was hovering (about 5 miles from the first sighting, and opposite of the direction it flew). didn't have time to get out of the car by the time the second one was lost behind a tree. unfortunately, the property was private, it was late at night and i was alone, so i wasn't comfortable searching the woods for the red/orange projectile.
content.summary: Bright white and blue with dark outline, hovering. shot out red/orange object, then took off quickly. saw another one later.

content.detailedDescription: This happened when i was a child but still remember vividly,was also witnessed by mother and father,deceased, at approx 3 am was awakened from sleep by buzzing and humming,very loud. also very bright this object was inside of house,the closest thing to describe would be about four people arc welding in the same spot at the same time.There was brilliant flashes and white billowing smoke in living room about ten feet from us.We all witnessed this and calmly turned around and went back to bed!This is what really stands out to me,although i was a child,my parents,especially my father would have never went to bed without investigating whether there may have been an electrical problem!We were all in an alter state of mind,which leads me to believe there could have been an abduction,i do not have the resources for or know of an accredited hypnotist,but would like to peruse one day.The next day my father did check for burn marks,melted recepticles,tripped breakers,etc.There was no evidence of these,besides what i witnessed,i am sure would have burned down the house!This happened approx 1971, i was around four but can see like it was yesterday,and mother can too,we often talk about it, thanks for your time
content.summary: Flashing orb,smoke, like electrical fire

content.detailedDescription: Ufos over sky were noticed
content.summary: 3 figures

content.detailedDescription:
I was in my room, usually writing computer programs and studying, or sometimes taking a break in the lounge room watching a movie with my elderly father who had early stage dementia at the time.

the first time this happened, my father called me out to the top of the steps leading to our front door and asked me to look up in the sky.  this would usually happen around 8pm local time and last up to 15 minutes, so we would often go out around that time when most of the night sky was visible in our rural, outback queensland area to watch "the spacecraft."

there appeared to be extraordinarly fast moving, glowing, star-like (but brighter) objects going across the sky.  they would sometimes move across the sky, with no known intereference or sound, and appeared to be well out of earth's orbit.  if i could put two fingers up and try to measure the comparative speed of the objects, to ordinary planes and jet fighters for example (not knowing exactly how large they were, or how far out they were) i estimated they moved across the sky (no light noise, everything possibly visible to the eye was visible) about half inch/sec.  they were way out, whatever they were.  and fast.

most of the time others would follow, half the time several would follow and appeared to be circling the local solar system.  sometimes they would appear from a very long distance away, in an arc around the entire solar system (or way out from earth), accelerate and then just disappear.

they were definitely not planes, helicopters, or anything i could identify.

there were no visible parts of the objects like windows or other identifiable characteristics, and in any case were bright white-like lights, star-like but not stars, and manouvered strangely on occasion.  there were often more than one, 9/10 times, followed each other, and would sometimes accelerate rapidly in an arc-like manner around what seemed to be the solar system (or just a significant distance from earth) and just disappear into the distance.

we did not feel anything strange.  we just watched, tried to identify what these things were, and talked about the high probability that advanced civilizations existed elsewhere in the universe.  nobody else around our little town seemed to notice.  while we had stills cameras and a small video camera, we didn't feel any urge to get evidence, and in fact i do not think the idea ever entered our minds.

we had the distinct feeling that this was it, 1) that we had the final proof we needed to make up our minds on whether spacecraft from elsewhere were visiting and observing, 2) that the universe probably contained innumerable other life-forms out there, and 3) a good enough proportion of them advanced technological civilizations, and given enough time to evolve and avoid destroying each other etc, would probably come across us on earth at some stage.

we would watch them eventually go out of sight, or simply accelerate and disappear, and go back inside.  it became an ordinary almost everyday experience for us.

most of the time we lost sight simply because they would accelerate and disappear (seemingly off into the galaxy or further away) or would travel across the sky and eventually out of sight.
content.summary: Star-like (but brigher) moving across sky, following each other, appeared to rapidly accelerate, disapppear

content.detailedDescription: Husband and i were out watching for planes, sitting on our porch. one plane had passed overhead going east and just north of us. about 10 minutes later husband noticed a light passing underneath the moon. watched as it moved from sw to se in a straight line. at one point it looked like a cylinder shape. it was a very bright yellow. in the picture it took it looks disc shaped by the time i got the camera out and took the picture it was to the south and to the east. the sun was just about to set completely and was not bright enough to cause such a bright reflection. there was no sound of a plane or helicopter as this object went past. the object finally went out of sight going eastward.
content.summary: Noticed a light passing under the moon

content.detailedDescription: Well me and my wife were hungry after about 12:00am so we went to mcdonalds and got some to eat and i was driving down the road when i seen some thing flying low like right over the trees and powerlines so i slowed down a little to see what it was its was to my left,it almost looked like it was skipping across the sky then as it made its way to the road it stopped like it seen us or something it sit there for about 5seconds then spead off at a very high speed.Me and my wife know for a fact it was not plane.
content.summary: Flying saucer gray large blue bright light on the bottom no sound two witness me and my wife.

content.detailedDescription:
On july 18 early morning around 2 am. i was woken up and couldn't move but also felt a sharp pain in my right side. i recall seeing someone standing over my bed watching me.  i heard clicking like noises in the room and in my head. as if to let me know that they were here again. because i had asked that i know when they would come to use me or take me. then i felt relaxed and think i slept for about 20 minutes. then i was awakened again. i felt very groggy but aware. immediately i felt my right side and navel for pain and cuts. then i was aware i was being watched. i looked over to my bedroom doorway and saw a tall being standing there. i had seen him many times before. he's my handler and works with me. he told me telepathically that the procedure was over. they got what they came for- my egg. and then he thanked me for continuing to work with them. he also told me that they will let me know when they come and go ad well as what they did. just like i asked them to.
when i woke the first time i believe the egg removal procedure was just started since i couldn't move but could feel the instruments inside my body already moving around. the one doing the procedure on me was shorter than the one who woke me up. i did find a scab in my navel the next morning. and have a very small, bump on the right side of my body near the ovary area. no residual pain. but did have pain all week after the experience. then some nausea. i'm relieved to have my cycle start.
content.summary: Woke from sleep couldnt move sharp pain and being watched

content.detailedDescription:
While i was watching a tv program that showed a video clip of the jfk motorcade passing through dealey plaza in downtown dallas texas, moments before the jfk motorcade was fired upon and jfk was assassinated, i observed a white disk in the background of the film shot that passed above a tall building in the background of the film clip.
the object was white, and it was obviously disk shaped. it moved in a definite flight path before it disappeared  from view as it passed above the building in the background of the motion picture shot which was showing the  jfk motorcade passing the person who was shooting the film.
content.summary: Ufo sighted in the background of a film made seconds before the kennedy assassination

content.detailedDescription: it all started as i was returning home from work. it was 11:30 pm and i was coming down my street toward my house. i looked up to my left ( ne) and saw 3 orange lights. i occasionally view the stars through my telescope and realized these being orange and not where stars usually are !I pulled out my cell phone and started videoing. i do live close to a flight path of the airport but it's far to the east. i have also worked for 3 different airlines and know how to identify aircraft. i found this odd because of where they were. i thought they may have been helicopters so i hurried to my driveway and got out to observe. these lights were moving slowly from the ne to nw making no sound what so ever. as i watched the first one passed behind a tree across the street then reappeared. the first one then slowly faded out, then the next faded out then the third did the same. this was a clear night with a half moon. i was amazed and ran into the house and woke my wife up to tell her what i had just seen and showed her the video. it is not a great video, it's turned sideways and you can't see the movement due to me panning back and forth, but i know what i saw and experienced and i'll never forget this encounter !
content.summary: Viewed 3 orange lights passing over with no sound

content.detailedDescription:
I have already sent much of what happened.  a few things i feel necessary to say i'm going to write.  my hand day after it happened re turned black at fingertips. i went to er, they did many hours of surgery but couldn't resolve blood flow and lost parts of my right hand and have had 5 surgeries.  my hand is still very deformed,i was then diagnosed with a very rare form of lupus it took over 6 months to come up with a diagnosis. i grew up on a farm,we had beefcake.  i saw something on tv about cattle mutations,we had several my grandfather was actually scared.  my grandpa was in the war shooting till his ears bled, he saw 2 of his brothers die,he was a very difficult man and had never seen him scared,he made me run into the house,which the amish own now,my grandparents are gone and i was young, 7 or 8.
anyway i'm writing because when i had this connection with this light,i saw the cows and saw they were using organs to finish development of very small fetuses.
also there are enormous underground cities. there are human and alien species preparing these cities. it's not just tunnels where people can survive a month,they are large cities,with flat small dwellings. hundreds of thousands of dwellings for humans to live,as well as certain aliens.  there are groceries produced,travel from place to place by magnetic subways,theaters,zoos,sewage,it is a place planned for dwelling for over 20 years.  they are preparing for the planet above ground to be uninhabitable. it's soon,but i won't be there,my youngest son will.  there will be people that do all jobs from entertaining to scientists.  they are going to take the best people able to contribute.  many people that are scientology people are aware of much of this there are many masons aware and many fdl or whatever they are aware.  the people of government ,most rant aware and most won't go.  they are able to do this with alien technology working underground with humans,deep.  they are all over and in u.S. they are everywhere but where there are 4 places the u.S. will move underground. these places are all connected and they have different companies doing different things so no one is aware of the whole. they have air they make,water they make,much is stored,they have waste places,but mostly everything is biodegradable,and reusable. everything has a purpose.  this is when people will join a couple races of aliens.  when it's time to emerge,people's dna will be changed ,there will be no disease,animals will be reproduced,whatever caused the earth to be uninhabitable will be gone.  earth will be one at peace without disease over 1000 years. the people going there won't know until they are taken there and everyone has a purpose.
i am anonymous in the beginning for fear of being deemed crazy,i am now anonymous for fear of being followed and harm coming to me.  i suffered a great deal of physical damage learning all the information i did,the only reason i can think i got this information is because i was to see my youngest son there,and make sure he learns what he needs to,but he is going to be very useful.  he's a very different child,very smart but introverted to an extreme. also they have many crafts but they travel using some sort of magnetism and electricity already in space from planets running into each other and dying.  old monoliths were put there so they would be aware of how,when,and where to travel based on when the stars going to die and they need that energy and passage.  i learned nothing growing up about these things,but experiences i've had helped me understand what i was being told. i apologize i can't be open publicly with this information,but it is impossible for many reasons.  i'm not sure if i'm supposed to be saying this at all,but the need is to great not to.  there is so much more,and so much people don't know,i'm sure there's much i don't know. the times i reported are not right but the time recollection is gone.  i can only go by my first operation on my hand that was under the light. there is no need to contact me,i'm currently going through very difficult times.  my husband was a police detective for 25 years. the highest decorated in our county.  but he woke up without his memory and doctors don't know why.  he couldn't remember a refrigerator or even his sister's.  he lost his job and since it isn't a work related incident,he's making no money,i make $700 a month from veteran disability.  we have had utilities shut off,no way to pay bills and don't know how to care for my son and husband of 23 years.  so right now, that obviously is consuming all my time. our house was foreclosed and i'm not allowed to work.  i must use all my energy trying to get through this.  two years ago we made $70,000 a year and had everything we needed.
i hope this information helps someone,somehow.
thank you for your time.
content.summary: I have wrote before explaining this

content.detailedDescription:
I was with my friends at the lake šoderica near koprivnica, croatia.
we set a camp and i layed down to the ground for a little rest.
i remember like it was yesterday, the sky was very clear and full of stars and then after a few minutes 3-6 min. i noticed a bright dot, it was very far, almost at the edge of atmosphere. it was fast. i thought it is a fast jet but it was not blinking. straight direction from south to north and what hapened next shocked me. the thing changes direction on 90 degrees at that speed. i said to myself wtf! after it changed directiom it wanished 6 - 7 seconds after. it looked like it's gone up to the space.
i will never forget this and i am sure it was not from earth cose it broke the laws of physics. unfortunately, my frinds didn's see this phenomenon.
content.summary: Glowing dot like a aeroplane light, not blinking - constant light

content.detailedDescription:
4 adults where sitting on deck at night in santa barbara, in hilltop rental home.  clear night, bright stars in sky, bright crescent moon.  all were taking in the stars.  
at 10:10pm an odd light appeared in sky, west of the moon, traveling north, about 55 degrees from horizon. at first i thought is was a shooting star, very bright and thick shooting star.  but the light looked like a 'line', as if 8 or 10 stars were connected vertically and never changed in length and did not have a trail and did not fade.  it was traveling at a steady pace, north in the sky, at the speed of a plane.  we considered whether it might be a plane, but the steady rocking of 11 o'clock to 1 o'clock of the line of light, combined with it changing from a solid line to a series of 5 dots of light in a row (like 5 stars were traveling in line together), back to a solid line, then to a shorter line with one dot of light at the back, then 5 lights, then a solid line, while continually rocking from 11 o'clock to 1 o'clock made us consider it was something else. we had a set of binoculars on the table from watching birds in the afternoon, and i continued to watch the event through the binoculars while my 3 friends watched with their naked eyes.  (we are two high level scientists and administrators at universities, plus an artist and myself).  

when the light finally slowed and then settled as if a stationary star, another beam of light appeared along side it and then mimicked the same behavior (northward movement at the speed of an airplane, rocking from 11 o'clock to 1 o'clock, changed form from a solid line to a line of lights and back, with different combinations of the length of the line and the number of single lights).  this ended at 10:16pm.  this beam of light did not stop as a star but slowly faded, as if getting farther and farther from the earth's surface.  the other star (last scene movement of the first beam) remained in the sky and didn't move.

we were all discussing whether this was a set of ufos, and truly analyzed the sighting as it was happening: size, path, pattern, time of night.  we compared it to planes actually flying overhead (flashing light with one red and other white, flying horizontally in sky not vertically north) and looked carefully through the binoculars.  we agreed that in all our 57 years of life (we are all close to the same age) no one has ever scene a pattern of light like this in the sky.  we were convinced this wasn't a plane.
content.summary: Solid line of light (like 8 stars connected) travelled north, with slow swagger from 11 to 1 o'clock for 5 minutes.  line changed to multiple white lights, back to solid line, to line with 1 light, then settled like a star. 2nd same formation appeared.

content.detailedDescription:
At about 10:10 pm mountain time near las vegas nm, my mom, dad, family friend and i were heading up our hill and at about 15 feet from the top of the hill is when we saw it, they were traveling from south to north, the 2 lights themselves seemed like they were part of one object rear red and front white, keep in mind we live in a rural area, we ruled out an animal, car/truck(because there is no road going from south to north) and not a plane either simply because there was no wind or sound around us, please get back to us about this,
thank you.
p.S: the lights themselves were about ten feet off the ground.It vanished into the night, and i felt like i had anxiety.
content.summary: This happened at 10:10 pm roughly, there is 4 witnesses

content.detailedDescription: I went outside on approx.June 9,2015 at about 11;30 pm to have a cigarette and sky watch,which i commonly do. i noticed coming from the north a assortment of white lights coming in my direction. the shape was close to a triangle shape except there was back section,it was basically a v with 7 to 8 lights per side. i'm not sure if it was many crafts flying in formation or just one craft.I'm sensing it as being one craft since they stayed tight for the whole sighting. the main reason i;m reporting this sighting is there was something strange with the way it flew over head ,it seem to be loosely hidden by some kind of cloud or fog cover. the mist stayed with the craft through the entire sighting. it appeared to be some sort of coverage for the craft since it was difficult to spot at first but once i had it in my sights i never took my eyes off it. it was also flying at a high altitude so you really had to look hard to spot it specially with the fog substance around it. i've had many sighting with photos of them but i've never seen or heard of this kind of action by a ufo. the ufo flew directly over head and continued to travel in a southern direction till i lost site of it. it flew at a steady speed without waver.I'm curious if anyone else spotted this type of ufo and also thought it important to report this since it had this slight quirk to it .
content.summary: Spotted high in sky  lights on two sides coming to a point. cone shaped with 7 to 8 lights on each side

content.detailedDescription:
Myself and four other family members were sitting on the back porch of our vacation home on lbi, new jersey. we had been sitting out there since approximately 8:00pm. the sky was clear and we could see many stars and planes in the night sky. we could also see several ships on the horizon giving clear indication of where the horizon line was. around 10:45pm i noticed two reddish lights well above the horizon line hover for a few seconds and then just disappear. i called for my family members to look at what i was seeing. then we all saw more lights appear at different spots in the sky. some of the lights appeared to start as one and then multiply into three or four lights in a straight line. all of the lights just disappeared. i'm well aware of the patterns of airplanes, helicopters, satellites, and ships. these lights were very different and there was no clear flight path and they were well above the horizon line and ocean. the lights appeared sporadically until about 11:05pm. 

i first noticed the object when i was looking out at the ocean and saw two reddish lights appear and then vanish without a clear flight pattern. initially, i thought it could be flares in the distance, but flares typically descend to the earth after being fired. these lights didn't do that. 

my feelings were somewhat of disbelief in what we were seeing. i've not seen anything like that before. it was quite surreal. 

we lost sight of the lights around 11:05pm when they stopped appearing.
content.summary: Sitting on back porch of vacation home with family members. noticed multiple lights in the clear sky disappearing and reappearing randomly.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving to work and in the sky i saw a slow plane and a fast plane. the slow plane was too slow in my opinion so i continued to look at it. it made the lights like the plane then all of at sudden it stayed white then got brighter and larger, sort of like at an extremely bright star about the size of a golfball, then i lost it behind the trees and couldn't find it again.
content.summary: Just an orb of light got larger and larger than lost behind trees never saw it again.

content.detailedDescription: I was at my brothers house in clermont, florida on 7-8-12 when i went out my bedroom door to the back yard. i saw some strange objects like fire balls coming up in a line 5 or 6 of them. i don't know what direction they where coming up in. i went back in and got my camera and started taking pictures. when i first started taking the pictures as the objects came up in line behind each other they where very clear but has they started moving so fast as i would take the pictures they would blur and they could change directions so fast. i continued to take pictures until it was like they disappeared. i told my wife and brother and his wife to come out and see right quick and look at what i was seeing. i asked them do you know what that is. and we all said i have never seen anything move and change direction at a 90 degree angle like this object did. i watched the for just a few seconds more going toward the stars and it was as they just disappeared. the next night i told my wife, my brother, and his wife the next night i was going to see if this happened again. this was 7-9-12 at 21.15 at night when the objects came up again in line again 5 or 6 of them. again i started taking picture again and called my brother and his wife and also my wife to see again what we where seeing. none of us could say what it was because of the way it changed directions so fast again at 90 angles. we all started kidding each other maybe is a ufo. but none of us could give a good explanation what we had seen. i took some 27 picture and have showed them to many people and they cannot tell me what they are looking at. david ferguson
content.summary: There where 5 bright objects came up in line 2 nights in a role. very bright and when i took the picture when they first come up was clear then they move so fast when i took the picture like a shooting star.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving east down rt. 72 in illinois when to my left, there was a glowing orb-like structure in the sky. the sky was still blue, with only the moon a bit visible. there was no chance of stars in the sky. the structure was a few miles above ground, but large enough to see the orb shape and bright light coming from it. it moved in a straight, linear path towards the ground, fairly fast for about 5 seconds and disappeared out of sight. i was shocked at first because i knew it had to be something other than a shooting star or plane. it was large and close enough to earth where it couldn't have been either. very interesting sighting.
content.summary: Orb-like structure glowing in sky that moved in a linear path, fairly fast, and disappeared out of sight.

content.detailedDescription: They have always bothered me
content.summary: I'm scared need help plesse

content.detailedDescription:
(credit:  tom tulien) (note: this is a historical case, and all the names in the following are in the public record.  the following was copied from a public website. william i. mcneff) early in the morning of 24 october 1968, oscar-flight security controller staff sgt. william smith received a report from a camper team posted at the launch facility (lf) designated oscar-6 (o-6). according to smith, the team was providing aboveground security for a target alignment team working underground in the missile silo when they observed a large glowing object that "went down by some trees not far away."[3] shortly after, at 2:30 a.M., a missile maintenance team of airman first class robert o'connor and a1c lloyd isley were en route to the november-7 (n-7) launch facility when they reported an unusual light in the east to base operations. the strange light appeared to be pacing their vehicle while growing brighter. by the time they arrived at n-7, the bright ufo had taken up a position circling to the south.[4]
in response, the base operations dispatcher patched in the observers at n-7 with the ground controllers at radar approach control (rapcon), established an open-line for reporting, and kept a log of the ufo activity over the next two hours. soon, flight security controllers (fsc) — the officers responsible for the security requirements at the launch control facilities (lcf) — were also reporting sightings via their communications network linked to missile wing security control (wsc).
in one instance, security personnel at three of the lcfs similarly described “the object separate in two parts and go in opposite directions and return and pass under each other.”[5] in another, a fsc reported that an “object which looked to him as the sun” came near the hardened antenna within the security fencing of his lcf. it then moved away and he dispatched his two-man security alert team (sat), who followed the object to within a half-mile of where it appeared to be landing. when the object reached the ground the light dimmed and extinguished. after this, they could see nothing.[6] independent reports mutually described a very large, brightly illuminated aerial object that would alternate colors from brilliant white to amber and green, with an ability to hover, accelerate rapidly and abruptly change direction.[7]
b-52 air-radar observations
at about 3:00 a.M., a b-52h stratofortress returned to minot afb from a routine 10-hour training mission. the pilots practiced high-altitude instrumented procedures and approaches to the runway, eventually requesting clearance to fly out to the tactical air navigation (tacan) initial approach fix (“wt fix”), 35 nautical miles northwest of the airbase. given clearance to flight level 200 (20,000 feet altitude), rapcon ground controllers then asked the crew to “look out toward your 1:00 [one o’clock] position for the next 15 or 16 miles and see if you see any orange glows out there. somebody is seeing flying saucers again.”[8]
the b-52 crew observed nothing out of the ordinary during the flight out. approaching the wt fix, they initiated a standard 180-degree turnaround that would eventually bring them back over the wt fix on a straight approach to the runway. at 3:52, as they started the wide turn, ground controllers informed the crew “the ufo is being picked up by the weathers [sic] radar also, should be your 1:00 position 3 miles now.”[9]
the b-52’s own radar detected the radar return (ufo) co-altitude at three miles away, sparking air safety concerns among the crew. however, as the b-52 banked around the roughly 6-mile diameter turn the ufo maintained a constant three-mile separation, moving to the northeast — outside of the turn radius and to the left of the b-52 as it finally rolled out.
upon clearing the wt fix to begin the descent back to the runway, the radar return suddenly changed position. in one sweep of the radar — less than three seconds — the ufo appeared to close distance to one mile, while subsequent sweeps would indicate that the return was matching the forward velocity of the b-52. the seemingly phenomenal and instantaneous movement of the ufo startled b-52 navigator captain patrick mccaslin:
i knew whatever it was that there was something there that i’d never seen on radar. i don’t know of anything that could go laterally in three seconds, two miles, and just stop. it was maintaining our descent rate, and then just laterally to one mile… perfect formation.[10]
at the same instant as the return’s abrupt change of position, the b-52’s two uhf radios ceased transmission on all frequencies with rapcon. the ufo continued pacing the aircraft off the left wing for nearly 20 miles. near the end of the descent trajectory, the radarscope camera filmed the ufo as it appeared to spiral around behind the b-52, after which the radar return disappeared and radio communications returned to normal.[11]
following the inexplicable radar encounter, the b-52 pilots practiced a missed approach to the runway and were vectored back around to land. however, on final approach to the runway a general officer radioed a request not to land, but to continue around in order to fly over and photograph the object if possible.[12] accordingly, rapcon controllers vectored the b-52 once again onto the traffic pattern, to the location of a stationary ufo on or near the ground, roughly 16 miles north-northwest of the airbase. immediately after turning onto the downwind leg of the pattern, both pilots observed an illuminated object more than 10 miles ahead of the aircraft. the non-crew pilot major james partin compared the ufo to “a miniature sun placed on the ground below the aircraft.”[13]
partial scan of minot afb investigating officer col. werlich’s overlay map showing the flight track of the b-52 around the first traffic pattern. werlich did not plot the second extended go-around when the pilots observed and overflew the ufo. he does nevertheless indicate the location of the b-52 during the pilot’s “first visual sighting,” following the turn onto the downwind leg of the pattern, and “probable area of aircrew ground sighting” in the rectangular box (werlich overlay map).
upon reaching the object the b-52 flew alongside and executed a left turn over and around it. as the b-52 banked over the object, copilot capt. bradford runyon was able to observe the ufo through the pilot’s window as it passed beneath the aircraft. he described a huge egg-shaped object with a surface that appeared to give off a dull reddish color like molten steel. as they began the turn, he noticed a smooth metallic tubular section extending horizontally from the long-end of the elliptical object, connecting to the mid-point of a curved crescent-shaped protuberance, not unlike a bumper. this section encompassed the width of the body and emanated a greenish-yellow glow from its interior back, illuminating the tubular section and the front of the egg-shaped main body of the object. once again, their radios would not transmit during the very close approach.[14]
the b-52 turned left onto the base leg of the traffic pattern and lost sight of the ufo. they continued around to the runway at minot afb and came to a terminal landing at 4:40 a.M. at 4:49, both the outer and inner-zone security alarms sounded at the missile launch facility oscar-7, and ssgt. smith immediately dispatched his security alert team to investigate. the team discovered the front gate unpadlocked, and an access hatch on site standing open, but no other evidence of intruders. in the meantime, november security personnel continued reporting a ufo west of n-7, until the light gradually diminished around 5:30.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Large egg-shaped craft sighted by b-52 crew & others.  missile silo affected.  radar detected.

content.detailedDescription:
my wife and i were takeing a late night stroll through a wooded area near our home. we know the area well and had frequented the grove many times. as we approached the wooded area we could see lights from the houses beyond the grove shining through the trees. as we approched we noticed there appeared to be shadows darting through the trees. we immediatly thought there were childern playing around down there.  we decided to go and check it out and possibly to scare the kids for fun.

we got close to the trees and realized there were no childern in the grove of trees, no one could be seen at all. we took a side enterence into the grove and walked into the trees, wondering if the shadows we saw simply came from the light from the houses in the distance, like mabey our eyes were playing tricks on us.

the grove was well light as there was alot of moonlight and virtually no leaves left on the trees. it was fairly cold; it happened before the first snow fall and dead leaves littered the ground.

as we walked holding hands into the grove we abruptly heard a footfall in the leaves; at that time the unknown entity crossed our path. it moved in glimpses as if under a strobe light, only no light was given off. as it crossed our path it was visible one moment then gone the next. this alternated as it strode infront of us.

it smiled at us and appeared to be waveing. i wasn't prepared for this and seeing it froze me in fear. the entity was a bi-ped that stood taller than me at 5"10. it was compleatly naked. though no genitalia could be seen. where human genitals should have been there appeared to be nothing there, as you would imagin a doll would look. its skin was a dark greyish color. it had very small black eyes which reflected the moonlight. it's ears were tight against its head, the ears came to a point.
the jaw was bigger than any humans. the jaw line went all the way up the sides of its head as if it's smile stared behind its ears almost. rows of sharp white teeth were visible as it smiled at us. it had slits for a nose that were slightly flared at the top. i can't remember how many fingers it had but it definitly had digits that it held up as it waved. the encounter lasted all but a few minutes. the instant i was able i twisted my wifes arm and i grabed hold of her wrist. i'm twice my wifes size with a very athletic build. i ran at top speed literaly draging her in the dirt through the leaves out of the grove up the grass hill through the soccer feild and into the street.
as we reached the street i noticed my wife was yelling and screaming at me to stop, and go back, go back she said. as she badly wanted to make contact with the entity.

but my fear over powered me and i dragged us both into the house. from our door step we could see the grove of trees. i immediatly said don't say anything! as i didn't want our testomonials to become tainted with any kind of suggestion from one another. i seperated us into different rooms and had us write down our testamonials of what we saw. 

to no suprise we both described the same entity with the same features.

 this event has effected my life very negativly, as my family thinks my wife and i made it up or are just plain lieing to get attention or something. 
not knowing what this entity was keeps me up many nights. i must have thought about every possibility pheasable. i though could it have been a spirit, a human in hollywood style movie make up, mabey a scoobydoo type hologram projecter, or even an alien. to this day not knowing eats at the back of my mind. 
i fully know aliens exist. with the vastness of space and the countless stars in the universe it becomes clear that we can not possibly be the only life.

even know i can feel my heart raceing as i recall the event. did i miss out on a one in a billion chance to possibly communicate with another intelligent life form? i only have one regret in my life, and that regret is not going back to find out for sure what it was.

if were ever going to communicate with beings like this (if indeed it was one) we need to have love at the center of our awarness, so we don't flee in fear for no reason.

for along time i never told anyone but my closest friends and my immediate family for fear that people would think we were crazy. but its come to a point that this itch in the back of my brain has gotten so bad i feel it nessecary to tell others of what we saw. i've become so obsessed with searching the web for possible information on the existance of alien life that i often spend hours of my time sifting through garbage on the internet just trying to find someone somewhere who has seen an entity like the one we saw.

i'm currently attending a trade school for an hvacr program, and in less than one year i'm going to have my epa 3 certification so i can handle refrigerants. i am not crazy.
content.summary: My wife and i were walking in a shelter belt area; when an unknown bi-ped walked infront of us waved and smiled

content.detailedDescription:
It was a dark, clear, a bit windy night, no clouds in the sky, just after 10pm, i was watching a show (included fire) outside, on the streets of the village, when i decided to look up. i could see the stars clearly and with them a bright orange ball, bigger than the stars and definitely not part of the fire/fireworks because i could see it was very bright and very high up (like the planes). it produced no noise, no one else noticed it (i think). it just stayed there and then produced a new ball (same colour, size) without changing it's own size in the process (unlike the cellular division). the new ball went a bit down and to the left of the first one. a couple of seconds later, they disappeared.
i've seen similar stuff on other videos of ufo's. at first i thought it was a star, but it was too big. i know it wasn't a helicopter, because they look different, too. i was amazed and a bit scared, but only because i realised that i was seeing something very new.
i usually wear glasses, and i was doing so at the time. i know it wasn't an optical illusion of the street lights or something because the balls were very bright! like the stars
content.summary: A bright, orange stationary ball (bigger and unlike stars) was seen in the sky, then it produced another ball, and they both disappeared at the same time
